question: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi has been conferred with the 'Legion of Merit' honour by which country?
explanation:
The 'Legion of Merit' honour of the United States has been conferred on Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
The prestigious award has also been conferred on former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe and Australian Prime Minister Scott Morrison. By this, the US President Donald Trump has focussed the QUAD group.
